summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Fifty-four and 99/100 ($54.99) Dollars, or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the General Fund, and One Hundred Eight and 60/100 ($108.60) Dollars from the excess Tax Sales Deposit Fund, as a refund of the purchase price paid for Lots Twenty-two (22) and Twenty-three (23), Block Four (4), Queen Anne Second Addition, which were sold in error for the condemnation of Second Avenue, under Ordinance No. 9311, authorizing the drawing of warrants therefor.
